entries.title: Video game workers form Microsoft’s first U.S. labor union
entries.description: A group of video game testers is forming Microsoft’s first labor union in the U.S., which will also be the largest in the video game industry.

entries.title: Sam Bankman-Fried pleads not guilty to federal fraud charges in New York
entries.description: Sam Bankman-Fried pleaded not guilty in New York federal court Tuesday to eight charges related to the collapse of his former crypto exchange FTX and hedge

entries.title: Startups spring from ashes of Big Tech purge
